so_44389011: awk -F  "-" '{if(NR%2){printf $1 " " $2 " -before load cnt: " $3}else{printf " after load cnt: " $3 "\n"}}' filename

so_26455543: find $target -type f -iname "*.txt" \
 | shuf \
 | awk -F- '{printf("%s:%s\n", $0, $NF)}' \
 | sort -t : -k 2 -s \
 | cut -d : -f 1 \
 | awk -F / '{printf("file '\''%s'\''\n", $0)}' \
 > $destination/results.txt

so_28971771: cat <<EOF | json_reformat | \
    sed -rne '/:/s@^\s+"(\w+)":\s+"([^"]+)",?@json_\1="\2"@gp'

EOF

cat <<EOF | \
    sed -re 's@(\[|\]|\{|\})@@g' -e 's/,/\n/g' | \
    sed -re 's@"(\w+)":\s*"?([^"]*)"?@json_\1="\2"@g'
